p.span: Pampa ISD Launches Home Learning Site

li.data-alt: MEal and Technology Distribution. Monday-Friday 10:30-12:30 Meal Monday 9-10 Technology WEdnesday 5-6 Technology Friday 12-1 Technology

center.strong: If you need assistance with any features on our website or in accessing a job application, please contact

span.strong: Si necesita ayuda con alguna función en nuestro sitio web o para acceder a una solicitud de empleo, comuníquese con Tammy Hernández.

span.span: “Our community is strong in tradition, compassion, service and faith. These positive attributes make me and my family #pampaproud!"

“I am #pampaproud because for 5 years I have watched teachers, coaches, administrators, and support personnel from every aspect of the district work above and beyond the call of duty to positively impact the lives of students, thereby strengthening our community.”

span.strong: ~ Byron Williamson, Senior Pastor, First Baptist Church Pampa

span.span: "I can honestly say that Pampa is amazing! The district adminsitrative staff and Board are focused on doing what is best for students, while maintaining a commitment to preserve the traditions that have made Pampa a terrific place to live, work, and raise a family. Pampa is a little slice of heaven at the Top of Texas! #pampaproud"

strong.span: ~Hugh Piatt III, Principal, Pampa High School

span.span: "Pampa is a great place to coach and teach. It is a one high school town that really supports it's school and athletics. We have great hardworking kids that are easy to coach and teach. Go Green! #pampaproud"
"I became Pampa Proud by being born and raised here, but I have stayed proud by watching school personnel willingly adapt their practices to meet the needs of a rapidly changing student population."

div.div:
Pampa Independent School District
1233 North Hobart
Pampa, Texas 79065
Phone: 806-669-4700
Fax: 806-665-0506

The Pampa Independent School District complies with all federal and state rules and regulations and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, gender, age or disability. This holds true for all students who are interested in participating in educational programs and/or extracurricular school activities. Inquiries regarding compliance and/or grievance procedures may be directed to the school district's Title IX officer, Dr. Nathan Maxwell, and/or Section 504/ADA coordinator, Jennifer Studebaker.

El Distrito de la Escuela Independiente de Pampa cumple con las reglas y regulaciones federales y estatales y no discrimina en base a raza, color, origen nacional, sexo, discapacidad, o edad. Esto aplica a todos los estudiantes quienes tienen interés en participar en los programas educativos o las actividades extracurriculares (después de la escuela) y de la escuela. Cualquier pregunta o problema que tenga puede dirigirla al oficial del Titulo IX del distrito o el coordinador de Sección 504/ADA.

div.p: Copyright © {{YEAR}} - Pampa ISD. All rights reserved.
